item.title: WTF?Compile error didn't change anything about it
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Ok i was editing npchandler.java to make some npcs talk
Than i saved it and compiled and got this error…

NPCHandler.java:680: illegal start of expression public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I added this into npchandler.java…

[code]if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) {
if (misc.random2(50) >= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “For low level player train at ::train2”;
}
}

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2170) {
if (misc.random2(50) >= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “For high level players train at ::train2”;
}
}[/code]
and they are like not even near each other!
Please help me!!!

Read full topic
item.source: WTF?Compile error didn't change anything about it
